title._content: ["As You Like It," James Harper Poor House, 181 Main Street, East Hampton, New York] (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["As You Like It," James Harper Poor House, 181 Main Street, East Hampton, New York. Bench above flower garden] [ca. 1915] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. Architecture: James Greenwood Thorp, from 1911; Arts and Crafts Style house for New York textile merchant James Harper Poor. Today: The Baker House 1650 Inn with some garden features extant. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2013. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16795 Call Number: LC-J717-X108- 68
